channel.title: German on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in German on Let's see what happens.

item.title: TTC Learning German
item.description: I started this course some time ago and then got distracted. I got to reorganize my goals recently so I returned to it and it goes well this time. One thing I noticed this time is that the quality of the production is actually good and helps the viewer. For example at any point one can move the attention to say creative stage background that is a mess too. It looks like somebodies experiments but it offers a light puzzle-like content to check at any point.
